# Triangular

> Triangular distribution.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var triangular = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dist/triangular' );
```

#### triangular

Triangular distribution.

``` javascript
var dist = triangular;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
